    • onCreate

      protected void onCreate(android.os.Bundle savedInstanceState)
      Method that creates the activity, linking it to its layout xml and initializes buttons for functionality.
      Overrides:
      onCreate in class androidx.fragment.app.FragmentActivity
      Parameters:
      savedInstanceState - If the activity is being re-initialized after previously being shut down then this Bundle contains the data it most recently supplied in ComponentActivity.onSaveInstanceState(android.os.Bundle). Note: Otherwise it is null.

      private void setupTextWatchers()
      Helper method to setup text watchers when the user inputs text, checking it with backend to validate whether the username or password is allowed.

      private boolean validateUsername(String username)
      Helper method to validate the username with backend.
      Parameters:
      username - the username the user has in the username field
      Returns:
      true or false whether it is allowed within the restrictions

      private boolean validateInputs()
